title: Overcrowded, but a must-see
text:
We went to Akropolis on 1st Sunday of the month, so we had free entrance.
The Akropolis as a historic monument is one must-see in Athens.

title: Good beer, good service, good food
text: We went to Erich and had a warm welcome. The beer was cold and tasty, the waiters fsdt and friendly and the food was good. If you would like to have good German food and drinks, we can absolutely recommend Erich's restaurant.

title: Awful food, too expensive, at least the beer was cold
text:
Unfortunately we went to this restaurant and were very disappointed.
The food was not good and therefore too expensive. Absolutely no place to eat. The drinks were cold and tasty.

title: Very good food, excellent service
text:
The food was very delicious and the prices are quite low for the quality.
The staff was friendly and we loved to eat there. Absolutely amazing!
